item.description:
Its not Fall unless we have been to Stephanie's for a nice warm breakfast. So grab that appetite and meet us for a morning of great food, conversation and lots of laughter.

 

We will not be seated until everyone is there, so please consider arriving a few minutes early. If the weather permits we will meet on the front porch and once everyone arrives we will move inside to the tables. If the weather does not permit please look for the organizers inside.

 

Stephanie's is known for their great omelettes, cinnamon pancakes and so much more. So we hope you will join us.

Please make sure you bring the Meetup Cell phone (978-304-2811) in case you have to cancel last minute, you get lost, are running late or can't find us.

If you have not paid your dues this year, please consider giving your payment to the organizers at this event.

Hope to see you at Stephanie's

Donna & Janet
item.name: Breakfast at Stephanie's Pancake House
